mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ITEM_ID) FROM ( SELECT X.ITEM_ID, X.NAME, X.CONTENT, X.PRICE, Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID, Y.ITEM_SIZE, Y.COLOR, Y.AMOUNT FROM ITEM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Y ON Y.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID WHERE X.ITEM_ID != 0 )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.ITEM_ID, X.NAME, X.CONTENT, X.PRICE, Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID, Y.ITEM_SIZE, Y.COLOR, Y.AMOUNT, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, Z.NAV_SHOW FROM ITEM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Y ON Y.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY Z ON X.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID ) WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ItemID} AND ITEM_OPTION_ID = #{ItemOptionID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ITEM_ID, NAME, CONTENT, PRICE, ITEM_OPTION_ID, ITEM_SIZE, COLOR, AMOUNT, ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, NAV_SHOW FROM ( SELECT X.ITEM_ID, X.NAME, X.CONTENT, X.PRICE, Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID, Y.ITEM_SIZE, Y.COLOR, Y.AMOUNT, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, Z.NAV_SHOW FROM ITEM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Y ON Y.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY Z ON X.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID WHERE X.ITEM_ID != 0 ORDER BY X.ITEM_ID DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM >= ((#{Page}*10)-9) AND RNUM <= (#{Page}*10)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ITEM_ID, NAME, CONTENT, PRICE, ITEM_OPTION_ID, ITEM_SIZE, COLOR, AMOUNT, ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, NAV_SHOW FROM ( SELECT X.ITEM_ID, X.NAME, X.CONTENT, X.PRICE, Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID, Y.ITEM_SIZE, Y.COLOR, Y.AMOUNT, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID, Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, Z.NAV_SHOW FROM ITEM X LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Y ON Y.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY Z ON X.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = Z.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID WHERE X.ITEM_ID != 0 ORDER BY X.ITEM_ID DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 4
SELECT NAME FROM ITEM WHERE NAME = #{Name}
SELECT ITEM_OPTION_ID FROM ITEM_OPTION WHERE ITEM_OPTION_ID = #{ItemOptionID}
